name: [OpenDeepResearcher](https://github.com/mshumer/OpenDeepResearcher)
summary: OpenDeepResearcher is an AI research assistant that iteratively refines search queries to extract, evaluate, and compile comprehensive research reports
interface: Jupyter Notebooks and Gradio web interface
Feature Highlights: Iterative research loop | Asynchronous processing | Duplicate filtering | LLM decision making | Gradio interface
Setup Requirements: Requires Python environment, API keys configuration
Key Differentiator: Combines multiple APIs with asynchronous processing

name: [GPT-Researcher](https://github.com/assafelovic/gpt-researcher)
summary: Advanced research automation tool with citation management
Feature Highlights: Detailed research reports | Citation management | Multiple search modes

name: [Stanford STORM](https://storm-project.stanford.edu/)
summary: Academic research platform with multi-agent discussions
Feature Highlights: Multi-agent discussions | Expert simulation | Wikipedia-style reports

name: [Jina Node-DeepResearch](https://github.com/jina-ai/node-DeepResearch)
summary: Node.js based deep research tool with iterative search capabilities
Feature Highlights: Iterative search | Token budget mgmt | Web reasoning

name: [DZHNG Deep Research](https://github.com/dzhng/deep-research)
summary: Flexible deep research tool with adjustable parameters
Feature Highlights: Adjustable depth/breadth | Auto-timing | Custom behavior

name: [Open-Deep-Research](https://github.com/nickscamara/open-deep-research)
summary: Research tool with Firecrawl integration
Feature Highlights: Firecrawl extraction | Data reasoning | Custom search

name: [AI-Web-Researcher-Ollama](https://github.com/TheBlewish/Automated-AI-Web-Researcher-Ollama)
summary: Local LLM-based research tool
Feature Highlights: Local LLM support | Focus detection | Result saving

name: [Tahir-ODR](https://github.com/btahir/open-deep-research)
summary: Gemini alternative research tool
Feature Highlights: Gemini alternative | Search integration | Report generation

name: [Standalone-GPT-Researcher](https://github.com/avrtt/gpt-researcher)
summary: Simplified GPT research implementation
Feature Highlights: Standalone fork | Simplified setup | Core features

name: [OpenAI Deep Research](https://platform.openai.com/docs/deep-research)
summary: Professional research platform with GPT-4 Turbo
Feature Highlights: Pro report gen | Advanced reasoning | Multi-source synthesis

name: [Gemini Deep Research](https://blog.google/products/gemini/google-gemini-deep-research/)
summary: Google's research platform with Gemini 2.0
Feature Highlights: Real-time analysis | Multi-modal | Google integration

name: [Claude Research](https://www.anthropic.com/claude)
summary: Advanced research assistant with system control
Feature Highlights: Computer control | Advanced reasoning | Tool use

name: [Perplexity Pro](https://www.perplexity.ai/)
summary: Real-time research platform
Feature Highlights: Real-time research | Chat interface | Quick results

name: [DeepSeek](https://deepseek.com/)
summary: Multi-modal research platform
Feature Highlights: Multi-modal research | Advanced synthesis | Academic focus

name: [You.com Research](https://you.com/)
summary: AI-powered search and research
Feature Highlights: AI search | App integration | Web tools

name: [Operator](https://operator.openai.com)
summary: Enterprise autonomous research platform
Feature Highlights: Autonomous research | Task automation | Advanced reasoning

name: [NotebookLM](https://notebooklm.google/)
summary: Google's AI-powered research assistant for document analysis and note-taking
Feature Highlights: Document synthesis | Context-aware responses | PDF processing | Smart summarization | Source tracking
Key Differentiator: Deep document understanding and contextual awareness

name: [Consensus](https://consensus.app)
summary: AI-powered academic search engine with paper synthesis
Feature Highlights: 200M+ paper database | GPT-4 synthesis | Literature review | Citation extraction | Topic insights

name: [SciSpace](https://typeset.io)
summary: AI research platform for paper discovery and analysis
Feature Highlights: Paper recommendations | PDF analysis | Citation management | Related work discovery | Smart summaries

name: [Scholar GPT](https://chat.openai.com)
summary: ChatGPT plugin for academic research assistance
Feature Highlights: Paper summarization | Key information extraction | Research synthesis | Citation support

name: [AgentLaboratory](https://github.com/SamuelSchmidgall/AgentLaboratory)
summary: End-to-end autonomous research workflow assistant

name: [Elicit](https://elicit.org)
summary: AI research assistant focused on literature review and analysis
Feature Highlights: Literature discovery | Paper analysis | Study comparison | Methodology extraction | Research synthesis

name: [Scite.ai](https://scite.ai)
summary: Citation analysis and research validation platform

name: [OpenDeepResearcher-SearxNG](https://github.com/benhaotang/OpenDeepResearcher-via-searxng)
summary: SearxNG-powered variant of OpenDeepResearcher with privacy focus

name: [HuggingFace-SmoLAgents-ODR](https://github.com/huggingface/smolagents/tree/main/examples/open_deep_research)
summary: HuggingFace's implementation of deep research in SmoLAgents framework

name: [Deeper-Seeker](https://github.com/NimbleFlow-Lab/Deeper-Seeker)
